sn48.21:1.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
sn48.21:1.4: As long as I didn’t truly understand these five faculties’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
sn48.21:1.5: But when I did truly understand these five faculties’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I announced my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
sn48.21:1.6: Knowledge and vision arose in me:
sn48.21:1.7: ‘My freedom is unshakable; this is my last rebirth; now there’ll be no more future lives.’”
